Posts.Content: Hello WW, So glad to hear your results with Xofigo. Coincidentally I started my 1st thread as a newbie . My husband had 1st Xofigo yesterday. My question...what are side effects and outcomes from this treatment. BTW I did post in the "general forum". How do I move or repost that to this prostate cancer forum? Thanks, Anniee (also a worried wife!) I will make a signature with husband's history.
Posts.Title: PSA down, Clean scan!

Posts.Content: My husband started Xofigo yesterday .. This is my first post so will soon give his more detailed history and share his outcomes with other treatments. In the meantime, iagnosed 5 years ago, G9, no mets, Lupron for 2 years/1 yr vac/resumed Lupron. Now 82 years. Always very low PSA..highest ever 5.3 at diagnosis. , now 1.08 after 5 mos Xegeva, Zytiga-pred, spot radiation,Lupron Aug. 2016-MRI and bone scan show extensive bone mets throughout spine, 1/2017-increased spine and now rib mets, mild pain started in December. Lifetime of excellent health other than this challenging cancer. I have been reading the threads on this helpful forum. Thanks for your advice and your personal experiences with treatments and outcomes. Anniee
Posts.Title: What side effects and results experienced from Xofigo?
